channel.title: Need help with my webclient
channel.description:
first im using webs.com for webclient
here's the code that i am using
<center><applet name=client width=765 height=503 archive="" code="client.class">
<PARAM name='java_arguments' value='-Xmx700m'> <PARAM name='server_name' value=''> <PARAM name='detail' value='low'> <PARAM name='ip' value=''> <PARAM name='port' value='43594'> <PARAM name='background_image' value='http://i31.tinypic.com/k17tpx.png'> <PARAM name='headicons' value='prayer'></applet></center>
and now when i add this to the webs.com, its just retrying to connect all the time, and guys i know that u have to put ur IP in the <PARAM name='ip' value=''> im not that stupid, and i can't zip my cache, i can't even install zip im using brokenX for my source and client, please help, if u dont understand, send a message, and i explain better with picture's and more, THANks

item.title: Need help with my webclient
item.dc:creator: @wildy_0wns1 wildy 0wns1
item.description:
@wildy_0wns1 wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:2, topic:393856”]I will upload the cache for you from dropbox so you can directly add to your webclient. In the meantime make sure your signlink has the name for the default cache.

edit: here you go

http://dl.dropbox.com/u/27893202/brokenXcache.zip[/quote]okey, i tried to put this into my website

and now it wont load, yeah now i giving out my ip, but i dont care, you thing that i doing anything wrong? please tell me ?!

Read full topic

item.description:

edit: here you go
